challenges.title: Learn how Script Tags and Document Ready Work
description: 现在让我们开始学习最流行的JavaScript工具jQuery吧.不用担心JavaScript本身-我们马上会提到他.
在开始学习使用jQuery之前,我们需要加一些代码到HTML文件中.
首先在页面顶端增加一行脚本元素.注意要写上结束符.
浏览器会在脚本 里运行所有的Javascript,包括jQuery.
在你的脚本 元素里面,在你的 脚本里增加这行代码:$(document).ready(function() { . 然后用下面这段 });结束 (还是写在你的 脚本 元素里)
下来我们会来更多的来学习如何写方法.你放在方法里面的代码会被浏览器加载.
在没有document ready function以前,你的代码会在HTML没有渲染完成就执行,这样会产生bug.
challengeSeed: <!-- Only change code above this line. -->
tests: assert(code.match(/<\/script\s*>/g) && code.match(//g) && code.match(/<\/script\s*>/g).length === code.match(//g).length, 'message: Create a script element making sure it is valid and has a closing tag.');
assert(code.match(/\$\s*?\(\s*?document\)\.ready\s*?\(\s*?function\s*?\(\s*?\)\s*?\{/g), 'message: You should add $(document).ready(function() { to the beginning of your script element.');
assert(code.match(/\n*?\s*?\}\s*?\);/g), 'message: Close your $(document).ready(function() { function with });');

challenges.title: Target HTML Elements with Selectors Using jQuery
description: 现在我们已经知道 document ready function的用法了.
那么让我开始写第一个jQuery吧.所有jQuery方法都是由$开始的,通常称作为 美元符号,或者简称为bling.
jQuery通过选择器来选择一个HTML页面元素的,然后为元素做些改变.
举个例子,要让所有的按钮做弹回效果.只要把这段代码写在document ready function:里面就可以了
$("button").addClass("animated bounce");
注意我们这里要把jQuery库和Animate.css库引入,这样我们在编辑器里可以使用这两个库.这样你可以使用jQuery调用Animate.css中的bounce元素给button元素使用.
challengeSeed: <!-- Only change code above this line. -->
tests: assert($("button").hasClass("animated") && $("button").hasClass("bounce"), 'message: Use the jQuery addClass() function to give the classes animated and bounce to your button elements.');
assert(!code.match(/class.*animated/g), 'message: Only use jQuery to add these classes to the element.');

challenges.title: Target Elements by Class Using jQuery
description: 你看到我们是怎么给所有的按钮做弹回效果的了吗?我们用 $("button")来选中按钮,然后用.addClass("animated bounce");给按钮加CSS classes属性.
你只需要用jQuery的.addClass()方法,就可以给元素加classes属性了.
首先,我们来使用$(".well")来引用所有使用了well class属性的div元素.
注意,就像CSS class一样,只需要在class名字前加.就可以引用了.
然后使用jQuery的.addClass()方法添加animated和shakeclasses属性.
例如,你可以将下面的代码写在document ready function里:
$(".text-primary").addClass("animated shake");
给所有使用了text-primaryclass属性的元素加shake class属性
challengeSeed: <!-- Only change code above this line. -->
tests: assert($(".well").hasClass("animated") && $(".well").hasClass("shake"), 'message: Use the jQuery addClass() function to give the classes animated and shake to all your elements with the class well.');
assert(!code.match(/class\.\*animated/g), 'message: Only use jQuery to add these classes to the element.');

challenges.title: Target Elements by ID Using jQuery
description: 同时你还可以根据id属性来获取元素
首先用$("#target3")来选择id为target3的button元素
注意,就像CSS一样,在id的名字前加上 #.
然后使用jQuery的.addClass()方法来添加 animated和fadeOutclass属性.
就是这样给id为target6的button元素添加fade out效果的:
$("#target6").addClass("animated fadeOut").
challengeSeed: <!-- Only change code above this line. -->
tests: assert($("#target3").hasClass("animated"), 'message: Select the button element with the id of target3 and use the jQuery addClass() function to give it the class of animated.');

assert(($("#target3").hasClass("fadeOut") || $("#target3").hasClass("fadeout")) && code.match(/\$\(.#target3.\)/g), 'message: Target the element with the id target3 and use the jQuery addClass() function to give it the class fadeOut.');
assert(!code.match(/class.*animated/g), 'message: Only use jQuery to add these classes to the element.');

challenges.title: Delete your jQuery Functions
description: 这些动画效果一开始很cool,但是有点太多了
在你的document ready function里删掉那三条语句,只留document ready function.
challengeSeed: <!-- Only change code above this line. -->
tests: assert(!code.match(/e"\);/g) && !code.match(/t"\);/g), 'message: Delete all three of your jQuery functions from your document ready function.');
assert(code.match(/
assert(code.match(/\$\(document\)\.ready\(function\(\)\s?\{/g), 'message: Leave your $(document).ready(function() { to the beginning of your script element.');
assert(code.match(/\n\s+?\}\);/g), 'message: Leave your "document ready function" closing }) intact.');
assert(code.match(/<\/script>/g) && code.match(/

challenges.title: Target the same element with multiple jQuery Selectors
description: 现在你已经了解了3种指定元素的方法了:通过类型找:$("button"),通过class属性找:$(".btn"),还有通过id找$("#target1").
尽管可以用.addClass()这种方式就可以加不同classes属性,不过还是让我们尝试永不同的方式给元素添加classes属性吧.
用上面介绍的jQuery选择器和addClass()方法:
给所有type是button的元素添加animatedclass属性.
给所有class是.btn的按钮添加shakeclass属性.
给所有id是#target1的按钮添加btn-primaryclass属性.
challengeSeed: <!-- Only change code above this line. -->
tests: assert(code.match(/\$\s*?\(\s*?(?:'|")\s*?button\s*?(?:'|")/gi), 'message: Use the $("button") selector.');
assert(code.match(/\$\s*?\(\s*?(?:'|")\s*?\.btn\s*?(?:'|")/gi), 'message: Use the $(".btn") selector.');
assert(code.match(/\$\s*?\(\s*?(?:'|")\s*?#target1\s*?(?:'|")/gi), 'message: Use the $("#target1") selector.');
assert(code.match(/addClass/g) && code.match(/addClass\(\s*?('|")[\w-]+\1\s*?\)/g).length > 2, 'message: Only add one class with each of your three selectors.');

assert($("#target1").hasClass("animated") && $("#target1").hasClass("shake") && $("#target1").hasClass("btn-primary"), 'message: Your #target1 element should have the classes animated‚ shake and btn-primary.');
assert(!code.match(/class.*animated/g), 'message: Only use jQuery to add these classes to the element.');

challenges.title: Remove Classes from an element with jQuery
description: 你可以通过jQuery的addClass()方法给元素添加classes属性,用同样的jQueryremoveClass()方法可以去掉元素上的classes属性.
像下面这样:
$("#target2").removeClass("btn-default");
$("#target2").removeClass("btn-default");
来尝试把所有button元素上的btn-defaultclass元素移除掉.
challengeSeed: <!-- Only change code above this line. -->
tests: assert($(".btn-default").length === 0, 'message: Remove the btn-default class from all of your button elements.');
assert(code.match(/btn btn-default/g), 'message: Only use jQuery to remove this class from the element.');
assert(code.match(/\.[\v\s]*removeClass[\s\v]*\([\s\v]*('|")\s*btn-default\s*('|")[\s\v]*\)/gm), 'message: Only remove the btn-default class.');

challenges.title: Change the CSS of an Element Using jQuery
description: 我们可以通过jQuery来改变HTML上面的CSS样式.
jQuery有一个叫做.css()的方法能让你改变元素CSS的样式.
我们是这样来把颜色改变成蓝色的:
$("#target1").css("color", "blue");
这跟通常的CSS语法有点不同,因为CSS的属性和值是在引号内的,并且用逗号分开.
把你的document ready function清空.
来尝试把target1改变成红色.
challengeSeed: <!-- Only change code above this line. -->
tests: assert($("#target1").css("color") === 'rgb(255, 0, 0)', 'message: Your target1 element should have red text.');
assert(!code.match(/class.*animated/g), 'message: Only use jQuery to add these classes to the element.');

challenges.title: Disable an Element Using jQuery
description: 你也可以用jQuery改变除了CSS以外的属性.比如,你可以让按钮变不可选.
当你把按钮设置成不可选以后,这会让按钮变灰并且不能点击.
jQuery有一个.prop()的方法让可以调整元素的属性.
我们是这样来让按钮不可选的:
$("button").prop("disabled", true);
$("button").prop("disabled", true);
Disable only the target1 button.
来尝试让 target1不可选.
challengeSeed: <!-- Only change code above this line. -->
tests: assert($("#target1") && $("#target1").prop("disabled"), 'message: Disable your target1 button.');
assert($("#target2") && !$("#target2").prop("disabled"), 'message: Do not disable any other buttons.');
assert(!code.match(/disabled>/g), 'message: Only use jQuery to add these classes to the element.');

challenges.title: Change Text Inside an Element Using jQuery
description: 你可以使用jQuery改变HTML文字的字体.
使用jQuery的.html()方法可以添加HTML标签和文字,代元素原先的内容会被方法的内容所替换掉.
我们是这样重写标题并让字体变斜体的:
$("h3").html("<i>jQuery Playground</i>");
jQuery also has a similar function called .text() that only alters text without adding tags.
改变id为target4按钮的字体为斜体.
challengeSeed: <!-- Only change code above this line. -->
tests: assert.isTrue((/#target4<\/i>/gi).test($("#target4").html()), 'message: Italicize the text in your target4 button by adding HTML tags.');
assert($("#target4") && $("#target4").text() === '#target4', 'message: Make sure the text is otherwise unchanged.');
assert.isFalse((/<i>/gi).test($("h3").html()), 'message: Do not alter any other text.');

challenges.title: Remove an Element Using jQuery
description: 现在让我们用jQuery来移除页面上的HTML元素吧.
jQuery 有一个.remove() 的方法可以移除HTML元素
试着使用.remove()方法来移除页面上的target4元素吧.
challengeSeed: <!-- Only change code above this line. -->
tests: assert($("#target4").length === 0, 'message: Use jQuery to remove your target4 element from your page.');
assert(code.match(/id="target4/g), 'message: Only use jQuery to remove this element.');

challenges.title: Use appendTo to Move Elements with jQuery
description: 现在让我们尝试把元素从一个div移到另外一个.
jQuery有一个appendTo()方法可以把选中的元素加到其他元素中.
比如,你想让target4从我们的从right-well移到left-well,我们可以这样使用:
$("#target4").appendTo("#left-well");
来试着把target2元素从left-well移到right-well中.
challengeSeed: <!-- Only change code above this line. -->
tests: assert($("#left-well").children("#target2").length === 0, 'message: Your target2 element should not be inside your left-well.');
assert($("#right-well").children("#target2").length > 0, 'message: Your target2 element should be inside your right-well.');
assert(!code.match(/class.*animated/g), 'message: Only use jQuery to move these elements.');

challenges.title: Clone an Element Using jQuery
description: 除了移动元素,你还第一把他们从一个地方拷贝到另外一个地方.
jQuery的clone()方法可以拷贝元素.
比如,如果我想把target2从left-well拷贝到right-well,我们可以这样写:
$("#target2").clone().appendTo("#right-well");
你有没有发现这让两个jQuery方法合在一起使用了?这叫做function chaining并在这样使用也很方便.
来尝试复制target5元素
challengeSeed: <!-- Only change code above this line. -->
tests: assert($("#right-well").children("#target5").length > 0, 'message: Your target5 element should be inside your right-well.');
assert($("#left-well").children("#target5").length > 0, 'message: A copy of your target5 element should also be inside your left-well.');
assert(!code.match(/class.*animated/g), 'message: Only use jQuery to move these elements.');

challenges.title: Target the Parent of an Element Using jQuery
description: Every HTML element has a parent element from which it inherits properties.
For example, your jQuery Playground h3 element has the parent element of <div class="container-fluid">, which itself has the parent body.
jQuery has a function called parent() that allows you to access the parent of whichever element you've selected.
Here's an example of how you would use the parent() function if you wanted to give the parent element of the left-well element a background color of blue:
$("#left-well").parent().css("background-color", "blue")
Give the parent of the #target1 element a background-color of red.
challengeSeed: <!-- Only change code above this line. -->
tests: assert($("#left-well").css("background-color") === 'red' || $("#left-well").css("background-color") === 'rgb(255, 0, 0)' || $("#left-well").css("background-color").toLowerCase() === '#ff0000' || $("#left-well").css("background-color").toLowerCase() === '#f00', 'message: Your left-well element should have a red background.');
assert(code.match(/\.parent\s*\(\)\s*\.css/g), 'message: You should use the .parent() function to modify this element.');
assert(code.match(/\$\s*?\(\s*?(?:'|")\s*?#target1\s*?(?:'|")\s*?\)\s*?\.parent/gi), 'message: The .parent() method should be called on the #target1 element.');
assert(code.match(/<div class="well" id="left-well">/g), 'message: Only use jQuery to add these classes to the element.');

challenges.title: Target the Children of an Element Using jQuery
description: Many HTML elements have children which inherit their properties from their parent HTML elements.
For example, every HTML element is a child of your body element, and your "jQuery Playground" h3 element is a child of your <div class="container-fluid"> element.
jQuery has a function called children() that allows you to access the children of whichever element you've selected.
Here's an example of how you would use the children() function to give the children of your left-well element the color of blue:
$("#left-well").children().css("color", "blue")
Give all the children of your #right-well element a color of orange.
challengeSeed: <!-- Only change code above this line. -->
tests: assert($("#right-well").children().css("color") === 'rgb(255, 165, 0)', 'message: All children of #right-well should have orange text.');
assert(code.match(/\.children\(\)\.css/g), 'message: You should use the children() function to modify these elements.');
assert(code.match(/<div class="well" id="right-well">/g), 'message: Only use jQuery to add these classes to the element.');

challenges.title: Target a Specific Child of an Element Using jQuery
description: You've seen why id attributes are so convenient for targeting with jQuery selectors. But you won't always have such neat ids to work with.
Fortunately, jQuery has some other tricks for targeting the right elements.
jQuery uses CSS Selectors to target elements. target:nth-child(n) css selector allows you to select all the nth elements with the target class or element type.
Here's how you would give the third element in each well the bounce class:
$(".target:nth-child(3)").addClass("animated bounce");
Make the second child in each of your well elements bounce. You must target the children of element with the target class.
challengeSeed: <!-- Only change code above this line. -->
tests: assert($(".target:nth-child(2)").hasClass("animated") && $(".target:nth-child(2)").hasClass("bounce"), 'message: The second element in your target elements should bounce.');
assert(code.match(/\:nth-child\(/g), 'message: You should use the :nth-child() function to modify these elements.');
assert(code.match(/<button class="btn btn-default target" id="target2">/g), 'message: Only use jQuery to add these classes to the element.');

challenges.title: Target Even Numbered Elements Using jQuery
description: You can also target all the even-numbered elements.
Here's how you would target all the odd-numbered elements with class target and give them classes:
$(".target:odd").addClass("animated shake");
Note that jQuery is zero-indexed, meaning that, counter-intuitively, :odd selects the second element, fourth element, and so on.
Try selecting all the even-numbered elements and giving them the classes of animated and shake.
challengeSeed: <!-- Only change code above this line. -->
tests: assert($('.target:even').hasClass('animated') && $('.target:even').hasClass('shake'), 'message: All the target elements that computer considers even should shake.');
assert(code.match(/\:even/g), 'message: You should use the :even function to modify these elements.');
assert(code.match(/<button class="btn btn-default target" id="target3">/g), 'message: Only use jQuery to add these classes to the element.');

challenges.title: Use jQuery to Modify the Entire Page
description: We're done playing with our jQuery playground. Let's tear it down!
对jQuery的介绍就到这里吧.让我们来玩耍吧!
jQuery can target the body element as well.
Here's how we would make the entire body fade out: $("body").addClass("animated fadeOut");
But let's do something more dramatic. Add the classes animated and hinge to your body element.
challengeSeed: <!-- Only change code above this line. -->
tests: assert($('body').hasClass('animated') && $('body').hasClass('hinge'), 'message: Add the classes animated and hinge to your body element.');
